code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ArticleCard=_ref=>{let{article,isFavorite,toggleFavorite}=_ref;const{id,title,description,url,image}=article;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"article-card",children:[image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:isFavorite?'remove-fav':'add-fav',onClick:()=>toggleFavorite(article),children:isFavorite?'Remove':'Add to Fav'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/article/".concat(encodeURIComponent(id)),children:"Read more"})]});};export default ArticleCard;
